### Complex Rheology & Biomechanics (CRAB) Lab — Georgia Tech  
**Undergraduate Researcher (Robotics)** · 2023–2025  
Design & test for multi-legged robot platforms; sensing & data acquisition; actuation integration; control software; fixture design; report-out & design reviews.

---

### Georgia Tech Solar Racing  
**Mechanical Lead** · 2022–2024  
Subsystem ownership (frame/aero/suspension/steering), drawing control, vendor interface, build/test/iterate, and reliability close-outs. -->
